#COVID19 #BAME #Vaccine #Hesitancy #Vaccine #Denial 
There is justified concern over vaccine hesitancy in #BAME communities but 'vaccine denial' is by far the biggest C19 risk
#localgov areas with high BAME (& high u16s) are not getting vaccinated according to their level of risk https://t.co/1d6jyJm99W
